item.title: Google Analytics for Tech Docs
item.description: You might have heard about the build-measure-learn feedback loop, a core component of the Lean Startup ðŸ¦„ methodology. Measure is important to learn how customers/audiences respond to a product or service. But, how do you measure the performance of your tech docs? ðŸ“š In this article, I’ll share some learnings when using Google Analytics to understand visitors' reactions to a tech docs website. What is Google Analytics? First thing first, Google Analytics:
